title: Tutorial (and sum.go) demonstrate the use of "&" to obtain a slice from an array
body:
by **consalus**: 
As of revision a5308e05a9, the spec doesn't permit the use of "&" to get a
slice from an array.
However, the Go tutorial in the "An interlude about types" section
demonstrates this functionality. It is also present the demonstration program
"sum.go".
